tns:patch.author: Alexandru Artimon
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_costing_donors AS SELECT eu.amp_activity_id, o.name, euc.donor_id FROM amp_activity_version a JOIN amp_eu_activity eu ON a.amp_activity_id = eu.amp_activity_id JOIN amp_eu_activity_contributions euc ON eu.id = euc.eu_activity_id JOIN amp_organisation o ON euc.donor_id = o.amp_org_id;;;
